title: Pedantic Playing
desc:
Post 1210
-If the host makes a mistake during the game, this card goes into the hand of whoever called out the mistake first
-If the host makes another mistake, then this card is automatically played
-When played, the person who played it may discard cards until they have 5 cards left. 5 cards will now also become their max hand size
-This card can affect the game even if not currently drawn (see first bullet point)
